amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy and to apply the savings of $1,657,774,000 to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy and to apply the savings of $1,657,774,000 to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 282 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
